item.title: API Documentation
item.description: API Documentation # UUIDs # Static utility methods for creating, parsing, inspecting, and comparing UUID instances in accordance with RFC 9562. The UUIDs class provides factory methods for generating all standard UUID versions defined in RFC 9562, including: v1UUID() — Version 1 (time-based UUIDs) v3UUID(NS, String) — Version 3 (name-based using MD5) v4UUID() — Version 4 (random UUIDs) v5UUID(NS, String) — Version 5 (name-based using SHA-1) v6UUID() — Version 6 (sortable, time-reordered) v7UUID() — Version 7 (Unix time-based with randomness) v8UUID() — Version 8 (custom format) It also defines constants and utilities for working with the special values defined in the RFC:
